    I do medical imaging research.

    About Me

    I am an electrical and computer engineering PhD student at Vanderbilt University performing medical imaging research.

    My Research

    My research experience includes using deep learning to classify whole-slide images and developing better image processing algorithms for diabetic retinopathy detection and grading.
